Sentencas: The compilation of measured effective rate constants for oxygen surface exchange on mixed conducting perovskites, which covers a great variety of compositions ranging from (La,Sr)MnO3 - delta to (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3 - delta and (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3 - delta, demonstrates the importance of ionic conductivity-i.e., high oxygen vacancy concentration as well as vacancy mobility-as a key factor for the surface oxygen exchange rate.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange kinetics on solid oxide fuel cell cathode materials-general trends and their mechanistic interpretation

Sentencas: This interpretation is corroborated by ab initio calculations, which indicate that the approach of an oxygen vacancy to oxygen intermediates adsorbed on the surface is the rate determining step for a number of perovskites.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange kinetics on solid oxide fuel cell cathode materials-general trends and their mechanistic interpretation
